title: Bad Romance
lyrics:
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (C)Caught in a bad romance (C)
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (Em)Caught in a bad romance (C)
(Am)Rah-rah-ah-ah-ah-ah (C) Roma-roma-mamaa
(Am)Ga-ga-ooh-la-la (C-stop) Want your bad romance
 
(Am) I want your ugly I (C)want your disease
(Am) I want your everything as (C)long as it's free
I want your (Am)love (G)love-love-love I want your (C)love (C)
(Am) I want your drama the (C)touch of your hand
(Am) I want your leather-studded (C)kiss in the sand
I want your (Am)love (G)love-love-love I want your (C)love (C)
 
[chorus]
(F) I want your love and I (G)want your revenge
You and (C)me could write a bad ro(Am)mance
(F) I want your love and all your (G)lovers' revenge
You and (C)me could write a bad ro(Am)mance
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (C)Caught in a bad romance (C)
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (Em)Caught in a bad romance (C)
(Am)Rah-rah-ah-ah-ah-ah (C) Roma-roma-mamaa
(Am)Ga-ga-ooh-la-la (C-stop) Want your bad romance
 
(Am) I want your horror I (C)want your design
(Am) Cause you're a criminal as (C)long as you're mine
I want your (Am)love (G)love-love-love I want your (C)love (C)
(Am) I want your psycho your (C)vertigo stick
(Am) Want you in my rear window (C)baby you're sick
I want your (Am)love (G)love-love-love I want your (C)love (C)         
 
[chorus]
(F) I want your love and I (G)want your revenge
You and (C)me could write a bad ro(Am)mance
(F) I want your love and all your (G)lovers' revenge
You and (C)me could write a bad ro(Am)mance
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (C)Caught in a bad romance (C)
Oh-oh-oh-oh- (F)oh-oh-oh-oh-oh- (G)oh-oh-oh-oh (Em)Caught in a bad romance (C)
(Am)Rah-rah-ah-ah-ah-ah (C) Roma-roma-mamaa
(Am)Ga-ga-ooh-la-la (C-stop) Want your bad romance
 
[bridge]
(F) I want your love (G) and I want your revenge
(C) I want your love (Am) I don't wanna be friends
(F) Je veux ton amour (G) et je veux ta revanche
(C) Je veux ton amour (Am) I don't wanna be friends (F)
(G) I don't wanna be friends (C) (Am) I don't wanna be friends (F)
(G) Want your bad romance!!!
